Interface IProjectView

public interface IProjectView

Interface for displaying project-related information to the user.

  • Shows a list of available projects.
  • Displays a message when no projects are available.
  • Displays detailed information about a specific project.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    displayEmptyMessage()
    Displays a message indicating that no projects are available.
    void
    displayProjectDetails(Project project)
    Displays detailed information about a specific project.
    void
    showProjectList(List<Project> projects)
    Displays a list of projects.

  • Method Details

    • showProjectList

      void showProjectList(List<Project> projects)
      Displays a list of projects.
      Parameters:
      projects - The list of projects to display.

    • displayEmptyMessage

      void displayEmptyMessage()
      Displays a message indicating that no projects are available.

    • displayProjectDetails

      void displayProjectDetails(Project project)
      Displays detailed information about a specific project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to display details of.
